original_title: Dir En Grey: A Knot Of
overview: With this compilation of live performances, Japan's genre-busting Dir En Grey delivers a fan-friendly package of highlights culled from some of the band's most memorable shows. Filmed over the course of three grueling years on the road, the release also features behind-the-scenes antics from world-famous festivals, including Rock am Ring, Rock im Park, the Wacken Open Air Festival and the Family Values Tour.
title: Dir En Grey: A Knot Of
